captions.text: I’ve played over 300 games with Alistar.
Just fits my personality.
Mess with the bull and you get the horns.
Alistar has a very aggressive play style and so much mobility.
When you play Alistar you can roam around the map and you can gank a lot of people.
A good way to build Alistar is to stack lots of movement speed.
You see a giant cow running at you, people get scared.
With Alistar on your team you basically have lots of CC and your AD Carry will have guaranteed protection.
To be great with Alistar you need a lot of map awareness.
You need to know where the opponent jungles are cause you cannot win the fight 1 V 1.
When I first started playing him I thought the W-Q combo was a glitch.
But I was playing on the NA server and the ping wasn’t very good for me so I was just smashing my keyboard and then somehow I got the combo.
I realized it wasn’t a glitch, it was meant to be a combo.
I was so excited.
Stampede!
You need your teammates.
I like to have teammates with some CC, a slow, a stun or even a silence.
It will guarantee that I will land my combo and when I land my combo its basically a kill.
My name is Alex “Lilballz” Sung and I play for TPA.
My favorite champion is Alistar.

title: Pro Player Pick: Lilballz Picks Alistar
